content.rendered:
Supabet247 Review

SupaBet247 is one of the many betting sites in Kenya that is a preferred betting home for many. It is owned by Nathan & Arianna, a top e-gaming operator. It is one of the newest betting companies around and allows customers to bet either online or using SMS. This is important as it open the company up to a larger market. It also avails a live betting option which many Kenyans happen to be interested in.

Supabet247 at a glance Features        Markets Offered        Live Betting        Jackpots   

Summary

Supabet 247 offers really good odds and you are guaranteed to keep betting with them. The high odds are important especially given many Kenyans are complaining if high taxation.

OVERALL

4.5       

USER REVIEW 0 (0 votes)

VISIT SUPABET 247

In-depth Review

Supabet247.com has a descent betting site and is enough to compete with other betting sites in the Kenyan market. In order to compete with top-tier betting sites however, then there is need for website improvement. Also, the company is yet to establish its position firmly in the Kenyan market, especially given that it has done little marketing. This site offers jackpot competitions and multiple sports betting options which plenty of people find interesting. It is important to note that this site offers limited sports bet options and this needs improvement.

Try your luck on the new spin and win game jengacash

Homepage

Features

This site is known for its easy registration process, good odds and simple interface that makes it easy for clients to cruise through the site with ease. This is very important as customers today value convenience and ease of navigation. One major drawback of this site is the fact that it does not offer casino betting. Besides sports betting, casino betting is a type of gambling that is popular among Kenyans. It’s absence makes this site less preferable by a number of Kenyans.

Registration

This betting site avails the options of both online registration and registration via text message. The offline registration is convenient for those without access to the internet and doing it is quite simple. All you have to do is SMS the word ACCEPT to 29247. You will then receivea confirmation message after you avail the required information.

Online registration

Here, all you have to do is Google www.supabet247.com and click on the “Register” option on the top RIGHT corner of the web page. You will then be enquired to read through the Terms and Conditions and then fill in all the required fields. After this is done to completion, you ought to click the “Get Verification Code” button or “Already have a code? Complete registration” after receiving the VERIFICATION CODE.

Jackpot

With regards to the jackpot competition in this site, there is no fixed value in the jackpot amount to be won. Every week, members get to attempt to win the jackpot and the total value to be won changes with each passing week. Regardless, the competition is free and fair and you could just as well be the next winner. The number of teams to be chosen from is 13 and there are bonuses, should you fail to get one team right and manage to get the rest right. What is different about this bet site is the fact that the minimum amount required to place a jackpot bet is Ksh 100. This is considered a high value by a huge number of Kenyan gamblers.

Sportsbet options

Football

Basketball

Tennis

Rugby Union

Cricket

Pros

Live betting available

Virtual games available

Deposit bonus

SMS betting option

Jackpot bonuses

Simple interface

Cons

Limited sports bet options

Limited number of mobile wallets

Not elaborate website

Absence of Casino games

Poor graphics

No cash out option

Supabet247 FAQ

How to deposit from mpesa

Simply go to your Mpesa menu and select Lipa na Mpesa, then go to Paybill, enter paybill no. 290036 and your Account No as supabet247. Enter the amount you wish to deposit and key in your pin. You will then receive a confirmation message after payment is successful.

How to withdraw.

Withdrawal here is quite simple if done online. Via text, you have to Dial *292# then select Withdraw, enter the amount you want to withdraw followed by SupaBet247 then your pin. You will then receive a confirmation message, informing you of successful withdrawal.

Learn more about kwikbet
